website_summaries.verdict: A unique, retro twist on the typical globe chandelier design. 5 light globes at various heights create a nice focal point in any room.
pros: Unique 5-globe design creates plenty of illumination for larger spaces compared to other chandeliers with single light bulbs
cons: Independent globes can sway when next to an air duct

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light fixture. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: We needed lighting over our interior stairwell with a modern mid-century look. This fixture was perfect and reasonably priced. Arrived in a HUGE box with Styrofoam protecting everything. We installed it on a vaulted (sloped) ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Excell

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing light fixture
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing light fixture. Its large in size, but what a statement it makes. I placed it in my kitchen over my kitchen table/island in front of a large window. It just fits right. I have 11 ft ceilings and I should have cut the wire to not have it hang so low; its about 30" above the table and table is 36" tall.
customer_reviews.author: JimF

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for money. I have high ceilings so was looking for a larger fixture with multiple bulbs. Anything similar was at least $500 and this looks and works great. I used amber glow bulbs for a warmer light and it really lights up the space but with a nice diffused light. It looks super stylish and way more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Extremely difficult  to install
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed. I love the style and quality of this light but had to return it due to have hard it was to install. I even called out two professionals and was told this is the most difficult light fixtures they have ever attempted to install. There are gaps around the edges ans when you try to put the screws in the whole out sode fixture shifts and caused the other screw holds to not be lined up. I might have been able to make it would with a lower ceiling. But not in my stairwell when I wanted it
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great look, and excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the money. Modern, upscale look at a fraction of the price. Install was easy, but my ceilings are slanted so I had to be really careful with the height of each lamp so they did not knock into eachother when the fan is on. The box they shipped in was huge, but provided ample protection, everything arrived in perfect shape and installed easily
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, Practical, Quality
customer_reviews.text: Elegant while practical design. Good quality and workmanship. Totally worth the price. This is our second one set. Had the first one in the other large bedroom. Looks great. Gives the flexibility of using any type of light bulbs. Not to mention the package was very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: FinProf

customer_reviews.title: Glass replacement
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Elegant, simple and good price. Unfortunately, after installing it we noticed that one of the glass spheres was partially cracked. I would like to know if there is a way we can buy a replacement of that part without having to buy the whole lamp again. I would greatly appreciate your feedback on this. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: andres

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, large statement piece for our two-story foyer. Came packaged well and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this fixture
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this fixture. Prefer the soft bulbs rather than bright white. Looks like pic altho cords aren't straight but looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a tall ceiling!
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is perfect for my tall, angled living room ceiling. Adds softness to a room with an angular ceiling and rectangular floating entertainment center.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne g.

customer_reviews.title: nice lighting.
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately one of the frosted glass broke. Is there a way to replace it without buying the whole light fixture again?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Statement piece at great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! Purchased a matching dome light for the hallway and it looks great! Ceiling is at a slant, and didn’t need any adapters! Great value for the money - statement piece for sure 🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: great light for the money
customer_reviews.text: packaging was great. everything intact. easy to install. light is in the dining room. looks very dramatic.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan leblanc sr

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't look like the to the pic on the web at all
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't look beautiful at all neither come closer the look on the website
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful for high ceiling  entryway.
customer_reviews.text: My family and I love this beautiful chandelier. It added elegance into our home.
customer_reviews.author: Alganesh Dade

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks bigger than expected. We used daylight LED bulbs and love how it lights up the entire area. Just wish the length was longer so it can hang lower from the 18ft high ceiling. Also bought a single globe light for the stairway next to it (from Amazon also). Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Carla | That Monochrome Label

customer_reviews.title: Varying Lengths of Light Heights Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: We have an industrial farmhouse look to our home but I still like decor on the fancier side. While I wanted something fancy over my dining room table, most chandeliers wouldn’t look right with the industrial farmhouse theme that we’ve set. This chandelier was the perfect mix of looks. The multiple bulbs give this light it’s chandelier look while the cording and black color works perfectly with the look of our home. The varying lengths of the lights also works really well over a dining table.
customer_reviews.author: ⛵⚓Seas the Day⚓⛵

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install / Instant Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this chandelier. It replaced a single hanging pendant light inside an ugly wire cage that was more shabby than chic. Since the electrical components were already in place, installation was easy. DH said the light came with everything needed except tools and bulbs. It was an instant upgrade. My concern was that it might look too modern for our home’s overall style, but with its black, versus chrome, metal, it blends in wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: ☮ S.Trasny

product_meta.title: Amazon Brand – Rivet Eclipse Mid Century Modern 5-Globe Hanging Ceiling Pendant Chandelier Fixture - 20 x 20 x 48 Inches, Black Metal With Frosted Glass Globes
product_meta.description: An Amazon brand - Contemporary, sleek globe pendant lights add high style and a touch of glamour to your get-togethers with friends. A round canopy with five hanging lights makes for high-impact illumination over your drinks and appetizers.
feature_bullets: Contemporary, sleek globe pendant lights add high style and a touch of glamour to your get-togethers with friends. A round canopy with five hanging lights makes for high-impact illumination over your drinks and appetizers. Product is hardwired (professional installation recommended).
Classic style with a touch of art deco
Black finish on metal with glass globes
Adds stylish flair along with light to your kitchen or bar area

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars42 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
